short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 使用8种公认护眼色，也可自定义护眼色，并支持设置提醒用眼时长，一切为保护好你的眼睛！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
这款护眼助手是为长时间使用电脑的用户设计，它的主要功能包括护眼模式、定时提醒用户休息的功能，精心推荐业界8种专业护眼色，旨在通过科学的屏幕亮度调整和定时休息提醒，减轻眼部疲劳，提升用户的工作效率与健康。
This EyeCare Assistant is designed for users who spend long hours in front of a computer. Its main features include an eye-care mode, a timed reminder to take breaks, and 8 professionally recommended eye-care colors. The aim is to alleviate eye strain and enhance user productivity and health through scientifically adjusted screen brightness and regular break reminders.

1. 护眼模式：根据自己喜好调整屏幕色温与亮度，过滤蓝光，缓解眼睛疲劳。
2.休息提醒：设置工作时间，达到预设时长后会触发休息提醒，提醒用户适时休息，保护视力。
1.Eye-Care Mode: Adjust the screen’s color temperature and brightness according to your preferences, filter blue light, and relieve eye fatigue.
2. Break Reminder: Set work durations, and after reaching the preset time, a break reminder will trigger to prompt users to take a timely break and protect their vision.

插件可以根据用户的需求自定义护眼模式，以及可以设定提醒休息提醒方式，可以自己设置提醒内容，确保使用体验不被打扰，同时为您的健康保驾护航。
The plugin allows users to customize the eye-care mode based on their needs, and it also allows setting the break reminder method, with the ability to configure the reminder content to ensure that the user’s experience is not interrupted while also safeguarding their health.

使用方法：
安装插件后，在设置中调整护眼模式，选择自己喜欢的护眼色。休息眼睛提醒的方式，可以间隔、倒计时的方式提醒。
开始工作时，插件会根据设定自动切换为护眼模式。
设置的计时器到达时，插件会以提醒方式提示您休息。

Usage Instructions: After installing the plugin, adjust the eye-care mode in the settings and choose your preferred eye-care color. The break reminder can be set to interval or countdown mode.
When you start working, the plugin will automatically switch to eye-care mode according to your settings. When the timer reaches the set time, the plugin will remind you to take a break.


让这款插件成为您健康高效工作的好帮手，远离视力疲劳，享受轻松工作！
Let this plugin be your great companion for healthy and efficient work, keeping eye fatigue at bay and allowing you to enjoy a relaxed work environment!
